mapper.select: SELECT bsp.prod_template_id AS productId, bsp.product_name AS productName, bsp.image, bpt.unit_name AS unitName, bsp.adjusted_price as adjustedPrice, bsp.modity_price_time as modityPriceTime, bs.storefront_name as storefrontName, bs.system_logo as systemLogo FROM dj_basics_storefront_product bsp INNER JOIN dj_basics_product_template bpt ON bsp.prod_template_id = bpt.id INNER JOIN dj_basics_storefront bs ON bs.id=bsp.storefront_id WHERE bsp.id =#{productId}
